body.$regex: <!-- this comment is expected by the docker healthcheck  -->

Docker.description: Docker is a tool designed to make it easier to create, deploy, and run applications by using containers.

Harbor.description: Harbor is an open-source registry that secures artifacts with policies and role-based access control, ensures images are scanned and free from vulnerabilities, and signs images as trusted.

Proxmox VE.description: Proxmox VE is an open-source virtualisation and containerisation platform that provides a web-based management interface to manage virtual machines, containers, storage, and networking.

browser.detection: try { return typeof PubNub !== 'undefined'; } catch(e){ return ''; }

PubNub.description: PubNub is a platform that operates the Data Stream Network, enabling the connection, delivery, and control of data and logic to support real-time applications at a global scale.
